dict.string: This will prevent all applications from using Location Services in the background, including geofences.
Allow apps to refresh their content when on Wi-Fi or cellular, or use Location Services, in the background. Turning off apps may help preserve battery life.
Allow apps to refresh their content when on WLAN or cellular, or use Location Services, in the background. Turning off apps may help preserve battery life.
A blue location services icon will appear next to an item that uses location in the background, including geofences.
